title: 🦫 Beaver Bank Blitz
description: 🦫 Bounce into action with the Beaver Bank Blitz! Scale embankments, scoop stray litter, and make the canal sparkle. Families, first-time volunteers, and furry friends welcome! All gear provided — just wear sturdy shoes and gloves. 🍃
perks: Free parking, family-friendly fun, fresh air & community vibes 🌞

title: 🌿 Greenford Growth Groom
description: 🌿 Join us for Greenford Growth Groom! We'll cut back overgrown vegetation, keeping the towpath safe, open, and welcoming. All equipment provided, just wear sturdy shoes and gloves. Families, first-time volunteers, and nature lovers welcome! 🍃
perks: All equipment supplied, family-friendly, fresh air & teamwork outdoors

title: 🚤 Hillingdon Narrowboats Open Day
meetingPoint: The Boathouse, Summerhouse Lane, Harefield, UB9 6HX
description: 🚤 Explore the heart of Hillingdon Narrowboats Association! Join us for an open day at The Boathouse on Summerhouse Lane. Meet the team, tour our fleet, and learn about our community boating initiatives. All ages welcome!
perks: Meet the team, tour the fleet, learn about community boating

title: 🏰 Old Crown Canal Cleanup
meetingPoint: The Old Crown, Station Road, Hayes, UB3 4BG
description: 🏰 Clear and Care! Join the Hillingdon Litter Pickers at the Old Crown to clean canal corners, and connect with community champions. Families, first-timers, and canal enthusiasts welcome! 🍃 All gear provided.
perks: Meet like-minded people, enjoy outdoors, give back 🌞

title: 🦡 Willowtree Wombling!
meetingPoint: Willowtree Marina, West Quay Drive, Yeading, Middlesex, UB4 9TA
description: 🦡 Embrace your inner Womble and help keep Willow Tree Open Space & towpath to Spikes Bridge sparkling! Gear supplied, meet friends, enjoy fresh air, and make a positive environmental impact. Families, first-timers, and nature lovers welcome! 🍃
perks: Meet fellow Hillingdon Litter Pickers, fresh air & community spirit 🌞

title: 🎨 Bankside Brush & Bin Blitz
description: 🎨 Brush, Bin, and Beautify! Join us along the towpath to sweep away litter, tackle graffiti on the mural, and brighten up Bankside. We'll head towards Parkside Yards where complimentary refreshments are provided. Families, first-timers, and community champions welcome!
perks: All equipment provided, family-friendly, fun & fresh air 🌞

title: FoGUC AGM 2026 (TBC)
meetingPoint: Grand Union Community Hub, 1 Quay Walk, Wembley, HA0 1DY
description: Join us for the Friends of Grand Union Canal Annual General Meeting. Review our past year, discuss plans for the community, and meet fellow canal supporters. All members welcome.
